name: Mondex
description: A handheld device.

name: Money bag
description: A purse for valuable and shiny coins.

name: Backpack
description: A travelpack to store stuff.

name: Monball
description: A ball for catching monsters.

name: Superball
description: An improved ball for catching monsters. Better than the Monball.

name: Hyperball
description: An advanced ball for catching monsters. Better than the Superball.

name: Masterball
description: The best ball for catching monsters, with guaranteed success. Better than the Hyperball.

name: Netball
description: A special ball for catching water and bug monsters.

name: Waterball
description: A special ball for that weakens fire monsters and attracts grass monsters.

name: Healball
description: A special ball that heals the monster after being caught. Comparable to the Superball.

name: Chocolate bar
description: Heals 1 health and tastes good.

name: Ice cream
description: A scoop of sm√∂rf ice cream and a scoop of raspberry ice cream make this a delicious and cold treat.

name: Chicken leg
description: A grilled chicken leg. Tasty.

name: Small health potion
description: Heals 25 health.

name: Large health potion
description: Heals 50 health.

name: Mystery box
description: A mysterious package containing basic items.

name: Mystery box Premium
description: A mysterious package with a higher chance of containing good items.

name: Mystery box Elite
description: A mysterious package with an even higher chance of containing good items.

name: Mystery box Ultimate
description: A mysterious package with the highest chance of containing good items.

name: Monbox
description: A mysterious box containing a standard monster.

name: Monbox Premium
description: A mysterious box containing a premium monster.

name: Monbox Elite
description: A mysterious box containing an elite monster.

name: God potion
description: A potion to remove all status effects.

name: Paralysis Remedy
description: A potion to remove the paralysed status effect.

name: Mind Calmer
description: A potion to remove the confused status effect.

name: Antifreeze
description: A potion to remove the frozen status effect.

name: Antidote
description: A potion to remove the poisoned status effect.

name: Extinguisher
description: A potion to remove the burned status effect.

name: Wake-up potion
description: A potion to remove the asleep status effect.

name: Lightbulb
description: Someone must have had a good idea, but this lightbulb is broken. Maybe you can sell it for a few coins.

name: Gold nugget
description: A gold nugget. It's worth a lot of money.

name: Star fragment
description: A rare fragment of a star. It's worth a fortune.

name: Caution sign
description: A caution sign. It's worth a few coins.

name: Blue cap
description: A blue cap for the trainer that speaks no truth.

name: Gray cap
description: A gray cap for the fashionable but inconspicuous trainer.

name: Red cap
description: A red cap for the nostalgic trainer.

name: Bronze Trophy
description: A bronze trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Silver Trophy
description: A silver trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Gold Trophy
description: A gold trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Ancient Trophy
description: An ancient trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Brass Trophy
description: A brass trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Old Trophy
description: An old trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Pink Trophy
description: A pink trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Shiny Pink Trophy
description: A shiny pink trophy for winning a tournament.

name: Steel Trophy
description: A steel trophy for winning a tournament.
